trans-unit.source: Specifies a type to be passed to the <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Write``1(System.String,System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceOptions,``0)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un tipo da passare al metodo <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Write``1(System.String,System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceOptions,``0)" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Write%2A> requires T to be an anonymous type or marked with the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventDataAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Write%2A> è necessario che T sia un tipo anonimo o contrassegnato con il <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventDataAttribute> attributo.

trans-unit.source: In addition, the properties of `T` must be a supported property type; either a simple framework type such as <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Guid>, <xref:System.DateTime> or <xref:System.DateTimeOffset>, or an array of primitive types.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, le proprietà di `T` deve essere un tipo di proprietà supportati, un framework semplice digitare ad esempio <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Guid>, <xref:System.DateTime> o <xref:System.DateTimeOffset>, o una matrice tipi primitivi.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventDataAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventDataAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or set the name to apply to an event if the event type or property is not explicitly named.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome da applicare a un evento se il tipo o la proprietà dell'evento non viene denominata in modo esplicito.

trans-unit.source: The name to apply to the event or property.
trans-unit.target: Nome da applicare all'evento o alla proprietà.

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Write%2A>, passing `null` for `eventName`, the event name is automatically derived from <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventDataAttribute.Name%2A> or determined based on the name of type `T`.
trans-unit.target: Se si chiama <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Write%2A>, passando `null` per `eventName`, il nome dell'evento viene automaticamente derivato da <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventDataAttribute.Name%2A> o viene determinata in base al nome di tipo `T`.
